open.title: Frogfoot| Glen marais, Kempton Park
open.description:
Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Glen marais, Kempton Park
, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: TT Connect maintenance | Boksburg
open.description: TT Connect is conducting maintenance in Boksburg on the 8th of November from 21:00 to the 9th of November at 06:00, users affected will experience limited to no connectivity during the maintenance window. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Fibre Outage | KwaZulu-Natal
closed.description: We are investigating reports of limited to no connectivity affecting clients on the Afrihost fibre network in KwaZulu-Natal. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

updates.content: We are aware of a National Long Distance (NLD) link outage causing degraded service in KwaZulu-Natal affecting our Fibre network. We are working with our upstream to resolve this as soon as possible.
